title: The Legend of Heroes: Trails through Daybreak - Soundtrack
description: Step into the dynamic nation of Calvard with the "The Legend of Heroes: Trails through Daybreak - Soundtrack."
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
Step into the dynamic nation of Calvard with the "The Legend of Heroes: Trails through Daybreak - Soundtrack." This carefully curated collection features 8 handpicked tracks that encapsulate the essence of the game's thrilling narrative and the diverse, vibrant settings in which it unfolds. Each composition serves as a vivid reminder of key moments throughout Van’s journey, from tense political intrigues to epic battles across Calvard's changing landscapes.

Crafted to enhance the revolutionary gameplay and immersive story of the Trails series, these tracks evoke a range of emotions, setting the tone for each scene and enriching your gaming experience. The soundtrack seamlessly blends traditional and contemporary sounds, mirroring the cultural amalgamation within the game itself. Ideal for reliving the game's most poignant scenes or simply enjoying the artistry of its music, this soundtrack is an indispensable companion to any fan’s collection.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Track List
<!--text-->
1. Namonaki Akumu No Hate -Short Ver.-
2. The Realm of Death and Play
3. Tharbad Night
4. The Other Side of the Cloudy Sky
5. Unmitigated Evil
6. Rise of the Grendel
7. Welcome to Montmart
8. In the Dawn
